features.description: Fix messaging.ts hardcoded localhost URL - must use api-config.ts like other API clients

context.bug_description: messaging.ts line 81 has: const API_BASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8000'. This fallback to localhost:8000 causes all messaging API calls to fail in production.
context.root_cause: messaging.ts was written independently and doesn't use the centralized api-config.ts module
context.fix: Import API_BASE_URL from '@/lib/api-config' instead of defining it locally
context.user_impact: Messages page shows 'Failed to fetch' error for all coordinator users

features.description: Investigate and fix 503 Service Unavailable errors on coordinator dashboard API endpoints

context.bug_description: API endpoints returning 503 Service Unavailable errors, suggesting backend is not responding or Lambda cold start timeout
symptoms: 503 status code seen in network requests
investigation_steps: Check AWS Lambda CloudWatch logs for errors
Check Lambda memory and timeout settings

features.description: Verify CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS is correctly configured for production environment

context.bug_description: CORS configuration may be rejecting frontend requests if CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS env var is not set correctly in production
symptoms: TypeError: Failed to fetch in browser console
Preflight OPTIONS requests succeed but GET/POST requests fail
investigation_steps: Check AWS Lambda environment variables for CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS
Verify production frontend URL is in allowed origins list
Check browser Network tab for CORS error headers
context.user_impact: All API calls fail with network errors

features.description: Fix notification preferences endpoint loading indefinitely

context.bug_description: Notification preferences page shows 'Loading preference...' indefinitely and never loads actual preferences
symptoms: Settings > Notifications tab shows loading spinner forever
possible_causes: Backend endpoint not returning data in expected format
Empty preferences array returned but UI expects populated data
Auth token not being passed correctly

features.description: Fix managed providers dropdown not loading in manual entry form
